snippet: Rescuers cut through the bottom of an upended tugboat on Friday to free a Chinese interpreter and searched for 22 other people after the vessel capsized in the Yangtze River.
abstract: Chinese rescuers search for 22 missing people on tugboat that capsized on Yangtze River, cutting through bottom of vessel to free an interpreter.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers cut through the bottom of an upended tugboat on Friday to free a Chinese interpreter and searched for 22 other people after the vessel capsized in the Yangtze River.

headline.main: China: 22 People Missing After Boat Capsizes in River
headline.print_headline: China: 22 People Missing After Boat Capsizes in River
